about_the_game:
If you’re a fan of Blood Bar Tycoon and want to support us and the game's development, the Supporter Pack is perfect for you! Not only will you show your support, but you'll also receive an exclusive collection of bonus items:

  • A sleek golden skin for your servers!
  • A golden skin for your body bags!
  • A golden skin for your morgue, fridges, and manhole covers!

Important Note:
By purchasing this DLC, you are primarily showing your support for Blood Bar Tycoon and Clever Trickster Studio, the game's developers. The flashy items listed above are just the cherry on top of your... bloody cake!

package_groups.title: Buy Blood Bar Tycoon - Supporter Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-1135G7 or AMD Ryzen 5 5500U
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GT 1030, 2GB (Legacy: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460), AMD RX550, 2GB (Legacy: AMD Radeon HD 6850), Integrated: Intel HD Graphics 630
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-11370H or AMD Ryzen 7 5800H
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1060, 3 GB (Legacy: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 780, 4GB) or AMD RX 580, 4 GB (Legacy: AMD R9 290X, 4GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: If you’re a fan of Blood Bar Tycoon and want to support us and the game's development, the Supporter Pack is perfect for you! Not only will you show your support, but you'll also receive an exclusive collection of bonus items!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Italian
